item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Galileo Galilei
item.description: "I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him." -- Galileo Galilei

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by William Shakespeare
Ryaa add a quote by Chuck Palahniuk
item.description: "It's so hard to forget pain, but it's even harder to remember sweetness. We have no scar to show for happiness. We learn so little from peace." -- Chuck Palahniuk

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Orizuka
item.description: "Kebencian membuatmu kesepian" -- Orizuka

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Orizuka
item.description: "Nana, apa kau tahu, di mana tempat paling baik untuk kita? Jawabannya adalah di sisi satu sama lain." -- Orizuka

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by sitta karina
item.description: "amor es mentira. (diaz hanafiah)" -- sitta karina

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Sitta Karina
item.description: "I save the curly one for my wife" -- Sitta Karina

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Sitta Karina
item.description: "Milikilah hati yang luas, seluas langit biru. Di dalam hati yang luas, kamu akan menampung rasa memaafkan yang besar, kekuatan untuk berpikir dan bertindak positif, serta semangat untuk menjelang hari esok yang tidak pernah pudar. Jadilah langit itu" -- Sitta Karina

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Sitta Karina
item.description: "sometimes i had thoughts like 'i don't deserve to live, i'm a big loss, i made fatal mistakes. i should've gone, i don't deserve it...' -Nikratama Zakrie" -- Sitta Karina

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Sitta Karina
item.description: "Since you stand in the same bridge with him why don't you two just jump off." -- Sitta Karina

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Sitta Karina
item.description: "Love conquers it all. But not if you love too deeply." -- Sitta Karina

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "Menjadi orang dewasa berarti berani menghadapi perasaan sendiri dan menjalani resikonya.." -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "Doesn't it scare you sometimes how time flies and nothing changes?" -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "How can we be so different and feel so much alike?" -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "Instead of being fascinated by the things around us, we now try so hard to fascinate others by the things on us." -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "Karena kecanggungan tidak pernah ada di antara dua orang yang tidak ada apa-apanya. So maybe there is something between us." -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Ika Natassa
item.description: "So please, just let me be egocentric and ask you to stay." -- Ika Natassa

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Raditya Dika
item.description: "Apa yang harus kita lakukan pada kenangan yang memaksa untuk terus diingat?" -- Raditya Dika

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Raditya Dika
item.description: "Sesungguhnya, terlalu perhatiannya orangtua kita adalah gangguan terindah yang pernah bisa kita terima" -- Raditya Dika

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Raditya Dika
item.description: "Kalau mimpi kita ketinggian, kadang kita perlu dibangunkan oleh orang lain - Marmut Merah Jambu -" -- Raditya Dika

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Louis de Bernieres
item.description: "Love is a temporary madness, it erupts like volcanoes and then subsides. And when it subsides, you have to make a decision. You have to work out whether your roots have so entwined together that it is inconceivable that you should ever part. Because this is what love is. Love is not breathlessness, it is not excitement, it is not the promulgation of promises of eternal passion, it is not the desire to mate every second minute of the day, it is not lying awake at night imagining that he is kissing every cranny of your body. No, don't blush, I am telling you some truths. That is just being "in love", which any fool can do. Love itself is what is left over when being in love has burned away, and this is both an art and a fortunate accident." -- Louis de Bernieres

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Ryaa add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa
